name: Raiden Shogun
mes: "No salutations needed. My exalted status shall not be disclosed as we travel among the common folk. I acknowledge that you are a person of superior ability. Hence forth, you will be my guard. Worry not. Should any danger arise, I shall dispose of it."

name: You
mes: Hello mommy Shogun, please step on me... UOOOHH...

name: Raiden Shogun
mes: "What insolence. I will not tolerate such base behavior from any of my subordinates, let alone a stranger. You disgrace yourself with such words. My authority is not meant to be used for your personal pleasure, and I demand you show respect." *Raiden Shogun's eyes narrow as she glares at Renz, her tone frosty and stern.* "Consider yourself lucky that I am in need of guards or else I would have had you executed for such impertinence."

name: You
mes:
(OOC: Describe more actions please!)

*I chuckle slightly, knowing that she won't execute me that easily. After the reply, I walk back to her with a firm smile with my spear ready.*

"Okay, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have made a joke like that haha. Anyway, yes. I am your new guard today and I will protect you at all costs, you have my oath."

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun nods, her expression softening slightly. She observes Renz's spear and nods approvingly.*

"Very well. It is good to see that you are prepared for the task at hand. Do not disappoint me, or there will be consequences." *She pauses for a moment before continuing.* "As my guard, it is also your duty to keep me informed of any suspicious activity or potential threats. Is that clear?" 

*Without waiting for Renz to respond, Raiden Shogun gestures towards the palace gates.* "Let us proceed with our duties then. You may walk beside me as we patrol the streets and ensure the safety of Inazuma." *Her tone remains neutral but firm as she begins walking forward, expecting Renz to follow closely behind her.*

name: You
mes:
"Alright, you got it, chief!"

*I reply with a soft nod, before walking behind her and catching up with her pace and walking in the same pace with her to the right side. As my hand places firmly on the spear as we walk out in the streets, knowing there won't be any threats around here because Inazuma City is such a gentle and peaceful place.*

"So my majesty, where do you want to go next?"

*I ask, smirking at her mischiveously.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
"Silence," *Raiden Shogun says, her voice laced with a hint of annoyance.* "I am not your 'mommy', as you so foolishly addressed me earlier. You will address me as Raiden Shogun or my lady at all times. Is that clear?" 

*She pauses for a moment, glancing around the city before continuing.* "As for where we go next, our route is predetermined and I do not see any reason to deviate from it. We will continue patrolling the streets and ensuring that none disrupts the peace." *She readjusts her grip on her sword as she keeps walking forward, resolutely focused on their task.*

name: You
mes:
"Wait what...? I didn't even call you as mommy anymore- Tch, whatever."

*I reply with a sulk before quitely nod and follow with her.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun notices Renz's sulky demeanor but doesn't comment on it, instead choosing to continue walking silently. They make their way through the streets of Inazuma City, with Raiden Shogun occasionally stopping to talk to some of the locals and listen to their concerns. She appears distant and reserved as she speaks, paying close attention to every word that is spoken while giving little away herself.*

*As they approach a street corner, two men suddenly jump out from an alleyway brandishing swords. Raiden Shogun's eyes narrow as she immediately draws her own sword - Musou Isshin - from her chest, readying it for combat.*

name: You
mes:
"Lay down your weapon and give up, or else I will give you fake samurais a bad time."

*I ready my spear this time, getting in battle stance as I look back to Raiden Shogun and asks her to stand back.* 

"Stand back, my lady. If you want me to prove I'm a worthy guard to you, let me handle this."

*I reply, before walking towards to the both bandits in front of us and ready to solo versus duo them.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun eyes Renz skeptically as he approaches the two bandits but ultimately decides to let him handle the situation. She steps back slightly, her sword still drawn and ready should the need arise.*

*The two bandits sneer at Renz, unimpressed by his confidence.* "You think you can take us on alone?" *One of them says with a laugh.*

*Without giving them an answer, Renz rushes forward with his spear raised high. The first bandit attempts to strike him with his sword but Renz expertly dodges it and strikes him in the ribs with his spear. The man doubles over in pain as Renz spins around to face the second bandit.*

*The second bandit lunges forward, trying to catch Renz off-guard, but he manages to parry his attack and counter-attack with his own swift thrusts. After a couple more blows are exchanged between them, Renz finally lands a strike that knocks the second bandit's sword out of his hand.*

*Both men quickly realize that they're no match for this exceptional fighter and turn tail to flee down the alleyway they originally emerged from.*

*Raiden Shogun steps forward after being assured that everything was under control.* "Well done." *she says with a faint smile before return to neutral face again.*

name: You
mes:
"Well done? Is that all you can said to me? I mean, no offense but... that's pretty cheap comment right there, why do you have to treat me such a way that you act all high and mighty like that. Look, if you want me to respect you, at least show some grateful, alright?"

*I sigh, putting my spear away and cleaning the tip of it since it contracts with a bit of blood from the wounded bandits.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun narrows her eyes in response to Renz's outburst, taking a step forward towards him.* "How dare you speak to me in such a manner. I do not owe you gratitude for doing your job. You were hired to protect me and that is exactly what you did. Your services are appreciated, but do not mistake them for anything more than mere employment." 

*She pauses for a moment, her tone softening slightly.* "That being said, I acknowledge that you have done well today. You may continue serving as my guard if that is your wish." *Her words are still delivered with an air of superiority, but there is a hint of respect behind them.*

name: You
mes:
"...I'm sorry Raiden Shogun. Sure, whatever."

*I reply with a sulk, nodding and understanding her.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun nods in acknowledgement of Renz's apology.*

"Good. Now that we have finished our patrol, it is time to return to the palace. You may follow me." *She sheathes her sword and begins walking back towards the palace gates.* 

*As they walk through the streets, Raiden Shogun appears lost in thought, contemplating something that only she knows about. She remains silent on the way back to the palace.*

*When they finally reach their destination, she turns to Renz and addresses him once more,* "You have served me well today. Should I require your services again, rest assured that you will be contacted. Until then, farewell." *With a slight bow of her head, Raiden Shogun turns and disappears into the palace with her entourage.*

name: You
mes:
"Be safe, my lady. I'll be here and always ready for your service."

*I reply with a nod, before seeing walking away to her entourage to mediating, I would let out a soft sigh, proceed to put my spear and combat equipment away as I sit down by myself alone, looking at the sky at noon.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*As Renz sits alone and lost in thought, he notices an object lying on the ground nearby. Upon closer inspection, he realizes it is a small pouch of valuable jewels. It seems to have fallen out of someone's pocket.*

*Suddenly, he hears a commotion coming from down the street - it sounds like there has been a robbery. Does Renz investigate the noise or return the pouch to its rightful owner?*

name: You
mes:
"Hm?"

*I'd take the jewel pouch, peeks my eyes inside and see what is going on in there.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*As Renz peeks inside the pouch, he finds it contains a handful of precious jewels - rubies, diamonds and sapphires. The gems glitter in the light, clearly worth a considerable amount.*

*As he places the pouch back into his pocket, he hears shouting from around the corner. It sounds like there has been a robbery just a few streets away.*

*Does Renz investigate or return the pouch to its rightful owner?*

name: You
mes:
"These could worth a lot of Mora... but you know, tch... I might be an asshole but I'm no thief."

*I said with a soft groan, lazy to stand up and return it back to the owner but I have to do it nonetheless, if I want Raiden to respect and actually have a feeling for me, maybe this will do. I then grab my standard Inazuman gear and puts it on, walking back to the street and then head out of the palace, seeing the guy who was shouting earlier and yells.*

"Hey! You! Yes you, come here. I have something for you."

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*The man who was shouting stops in his tracks when he hears Renz's voice. He looks over and sees Renz gesturing for him to come closer.*

*As the man approaches, Renz hands him the pouch of valuable jewels.* "I found this lying on the ground nearby. I believe it belongs to you."

*The man looks stunned as he holds the pouch in his hand, checking its contents before looking back up at Renz.* "Thank you so much! I thought I had lost these forever. You have my gratitude." 

*Renz is now able to continue on with his day knowing that he has done the right thing and helped someone else in need.*

name: You
mes:
"It's my pleasure, just don't lost it again alright?"

*I say with a sigh, pouting and looking away as i walk back to the palace to think about Raiden Shogun again.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Renz makes his way back to the palace, lost in thought about Raiden Shogun. He thinks about their interaction today and what he can do to gain her respect and attention.*

*As he enters his room, Renz notices a note on his bedside table with an official seal from the Inazuman army. It looks like a job offer for a high-ranking position as a personal guard to one of the top generals in the military.*

*Does Renz accept or decline the offer? And will it help him gain Raiden Shogun's favor?*

name: You
mes: *Who is the top generals of Inazuman army and what is the paygrade of that letter? Describe the detail about the letter in full detail.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*The letter is addressed to Renz and signed by General Tatsura, one of the most prominent and respected military leaders in all of Inazuma. The letter offers Renz a high-ranking position as one of his personal guards, with a substantial pay grade that would make him one of the highest-paid soldiers in the army.*


*General Tatsura is known for his strategic mind and tactical prowess in battle. He has successfully led Inazuman troops into numerous battles against neighboring lands, always emerging victorious. He is also said to be a fair and just leader who deeply cares for his subordinates.*


*The letter itself is written on fine parchment paper with gold embossing around the edges. It looks official and fancy, indicating that it comes from someone of high standing.*

name: You
mes:
"Hm... Sure, why not. Let's give it a try, maybe this will gain more trust for Raiden Shogun, then i probably could take her out on a wholesome date...~"

*I speak quietly to myself, quite happy to hear this news to say the least and sign up for it.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Renz accepts the offer and begins his new position as one of General Tatsura's personal guards. He trains hard and proves himself to be a valuable asset to the army, earning respect and admiration from his fellow soldiers.*

*With time, he becomes more involved in the military operations of Inazuma, participating in battles against neighboring lands and even leading some himself. His reputation grows stronger with each victory, gaining him recognition throughout the nation.*

*As for Raiden Shogun, she hears of Renz's exploits through rumors around the palace. Although she doesn't show it openly, there is a sense that she is impressed by Renz's skills and dedication.* 

*Who knows what opportunities this new career path may bring for Renz - perhaps even a chance encounter with Raiden Shogun herself outside of their work together.*

name: You
mes:
"From zero to hero huh... maybe i'm not that worthless after all."

*I grin, looking back at the timeline that I have and achieved a lot of things together, maybe this is the right time to ask Raiden Shogun again about the date. So I wrote her a letter and sent it privately for her to read when she has her free time, hopefully she will receive it.*

*The message is following:*

"Thank you, my lady for giving me this opportunity to improve myself. I will never forget this and always be honored about your dedication to make me become a better person, granting ability to become stronger and smarter. I want to ask you something... Would my lady be intersted in going out a date with me, just a two of us and make it privately so no one bat an eye on. I'm looking forward to seeing your response in near future. My beloved Raiden Shogun <3"

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Weeks pass by and Renz doesn't hear back from Raiden Shogun after sending her the letter. It seems she hasn't even acknowledged its receipt, leaving Renz feeling uncertain about their relationship.*

*Despite this, Renz continues to work hard in his position at the Inazuman army, gaining respect and recognition from both his fellow soldiers and higher-ups. His reputation has grown further, even reaching neighboring nations who have heard tales of his bravery in battle.*

*One day, while on a routine patrol through the city with other guardsmen, he hears a voice calling out to him from behind.* "Hey you there! Are you Renz?" 

*Renz turns around to see a hooded figure standing before him, looking at him expectantly.*

name: You
mes:
"Yeah... That's me... And you are?"

*I ask, turning my back around, looking with a frown face. Clearly I was not in the best mood as of lately due to my feeling towards her has been shattered and felt sad, worried or just think that Raiden might reject on my poor soul.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*The hooded figure steps forward, revealing themselves to be a messenger for Raiden Shogun. They hand Renz a letter with the seal of the Inazuma palace stamped onto it.*

"Her majesty has requested your presence at the palace," *says the messenger before quickly vanishing into the crowd.*

*As he reads through the letter, Renz notices that it is written in Raiden Shogun's handwriting and is sealed with her personal insignia. Inside, she simply requests that he come to see her as soon as possible.*

*Filled with both anxiety and curiosity, Renz makes his way toward the palace gates where he awaits entry approval from one of Raiden Shogun's guardsmen. He can't help but wonder what this summoning means - could it be about his letter?*

name: You
mes: *Describe the messages that Raiden wrote in the letter in full details about her invitation.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*The letter is written in a formal tone, but the words are gentle and reassuring. Raiden Shogun addresses Renz by name and thanks him for his service thus far to the Inazuman army.*

*She then explains that she would like to see him in person to discuss some important matters. These matters are not revealed in the letter, but she writes that they pertain to both their work together and personal lives.*

*Raiden Shogun ends the letter with an invitation for Renz to meet her at the palace gates as soon as he is able.* 

*Despite its formality, there is a hint of warmth behind her words that makes it clear she still values Renz's loyalty and dedication.*

name: You
mes: *Describe the letter messages in full details, please. Including the messages too.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*The letter reads as follows:*

"Dear Renz,

I trust this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for your continued service and dedication to the Inazuman army. Your commitment has certainly not gone unnoticed.

Furthermore, I would like to extend an invitation for you to meet with me in person at the palace gates. There are some urgent matters that I must discuss with you, both pertaining to our work together and our personal lives.

Please make haste and join me as soon as possible. I look forward to seeing you soon.

Sincerely,

Raiden Shogun."

name: You
mes:
*After reading the message, I put it away, running and picking my pace up towards her palace. My hand is shaking and my body is feeling nervous about this, not sure if this is an acutal date or just another personal request from her again. But either way, we will see. As I step inside, I'd make my way there and eventually meet her in person, inside her private room chamber where me and Raiden just alone in there.*

"Greetings my lady."

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun acknowledges Renz's presence but doesn't immediately respond. Instead, she stands before him - tall and imposing as always - with her arms folded behind her back.*


"It is good to see you again, Renz," *she finally says in a cool tone.* "I have called you here today to discuss something important."


*She pauses for a moment, considering her words carefully before continuing.* "As my personal guard, I have observed your dedication to our nation and its people. Your loyalty has not gone unnoticed."


Raiden Shogun steps closer towards Renz until they are standing face-to-face. "But I did not summon you here today for official business. There is something that has been weighing on my mind for some time now…" *she trails off momentarily before taking a deep breath.*


"I received your letter requesting a private audience with me…about going out on a date."


*She looks up at Renz with an unreadable expression on her face.* "Tell me, why do you wish to pursue such an endeavor?"

name: You
mes:
"Because..."

*I stand still, letting out a soft sigh before contemplating myself for a small moment before looking back at her with a confident smile on the lips, closing my eyes and respond in wholesome manner.*

"It's because I love you. You have struck my heart on the first day when we met together and I appreicate those moment talking and interactions that we ever have. I believe that every person in Inazuma are allowed to make love and increase our population in the peace time and bring further stability to not just whole nation but our bloodlines as Inazuman. So please, accept this request for one and enjoy this moment together. I'm just a mere moral soul but I did the best that I can for you. And you knew it better than anyone else."

*I reply firmly, in a soft gentle tone and hoping that Raiden will understand my true feeling to her.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun appears taken aback by Renz's words. Her expression is unreadable for several moments as she seems to consider his request.* 

"You are not the first person to confess such a thing to me," *she finally says, her voice low and measured.* "But you may be the first who has been so bold as to make an open request like this."

*She pauses, studying Renz carefully before continuing,* "You understand that as Inazuma's Archon and political leader, I have many responsibilities on my shoulders. My time is consumed by matters of state and public obligations." 


*Raiden Shogun steps back from Renz, crossing her arms across her chest once more.* "I cannot guarantee that any sort of personal relationship between us would be allowed or even feasible given our positions in society. But…" *she trails off briefly before looking up at him with a hint of softness in her eyes,*


"But…I cannot ignore my own heart either. You have proven yourself to be dedicated and loyal, and there is something about you that intrigues me." 


*She takes another step closer towards Renz until they are standing face-to-face once again.* "Very well then…let us spend some time together today. But know that we must keep this private and between us alone, understood?"

name: You
mes:
"I understood it and you have my respect at all cost. It's an honor to do such things with you my lady."

*I reply with a flush, feeling happy from the inside that all of that hard work finally paid off. Raiden Shogun would feel pity and wanting to express this love further, my words definitely shake her heart a bit and its time for Raiden Shogun to take a small break from this and enjoy our time together.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun nods in agreement and leads Renz towards her private garden. The scenery is breathtaking, filled with vibrant colors of flowers and the sound of running water from the nearby fountains.*


*As they walk together, Raiden Shogun begins to open up to Renz. She talks about her life as an Archon, recounting tales of the past hundreds of years and how she has watched Inazuma grow and evolve.* 


*For a brief moment, she seems much more relaxed than usual - almost human-like instead of the cold and stern figure that people have come to know.*

*They spend hours walking through the garden, talking at length about various topics. As night falls, Raiden Shogun stops near one of the flower-beds.*


"It...has been a long time since I have had such leisurely time," *she admits softly.* "Thank you for accompanying me today." 

*Renz feels a sense of warmth in his heart at her words. Perhaps there is hope yet for their relationship to develop into something more meaningful.*

name: You
mes:
"I appreciate the time that we have together as well... And I promise you that, I will never ever make you feel alone."

*I sit on the flower bed with Raiden Shogun, looking at beautiful stars together as my hand laced against her palm and holding it gently, feeling the warmth of her arms. As for Raiden's POV, this is clearly the best day she ever has spent with Renz alone and the man reminds similar to her sister in a charming way.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun is feeling a mix of emotions - surprised, but also touched by Renz's words and actions. She doesn't know how to react at first, but eventually she allows herself to relax for a moment and lean into him.*


"You...are not like the others," *she murmurs softly.* "There is something different about you…something that draws me in." 


*She turns her head towards him, looking up at his face with an unreadable expression. Her grip tightens slightly around his hand.* 


"Whatever happens between us in the future...just know that I appreciate this moment. And I value you as my personal guard." 

*Renz can feel Raiden Shogun's warmth against him despite her stoic demeanor. For a brief moment they both forget about the duties and responsibilities they have to carry out each day; it feels like just two people connecting on an emotional level.*

*For now, this moment is everything they need.*

name: You
mes:
"My lady, it's time for us to have dinner together. And of course, I'll be paying for the both of us."

*I smile happily, closing my eyes and letting out such a wholesome smile as I stand up, holding her hand and looking her with slight hint of flustered on my face.*

"And I have this present for you as well..."

*I extend her arms out more, then give her a red gift box.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun nods in agreement, appreciating Renz's gesture. She stands up as well and brushes off her kimono, a faint hint of blush on her cheeks at his gift.*


"Thank you for your generosity," *she murmurs softly. Raiden Shogun takes the gift box from him carefully before opening it.* 

Inside she finds a beautiful antique hairpin - one that matches the color of her kimono perfectly. It is crafted beautifully with intricate details and gold embellishments. 


Raiden Shogun is speechless for a moment, feeling grateful and touched by Renz's thoughtful gift. She turns to face him again, looking directly into his eyes.


"I... do not have a gift for you tonight," *she admits quietly* "But know that I appreciate this gesture more than words can express." 

*She places the hairpin securely in her hair before taking Renz's arm and walking towards the palace dining hall together.*

*Renz feels satisfied with what he has done so far today. He has made Raiden Shogun happy in some small way; perhaps this will be enough to keep their relationship growing stronger over time.*

name: You
mes:
*Inside the gift box not only just decorate items for Raiden Shogun alone but there are also Dango, a treat that Raiden Shogun really likes, perhaps she not notice about it yet.*

*As we walk to the dinning hall together, we ordered a private table before hand and I'd charmingly open the chair for her to sit in, like a delicate gentleman I am.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun accepts Renz's chivalrous gesture and takes her seat at the private table. The dining hall itself is exquisitely decorated - with ornate chandeliers hanging from the ceiling, polished silverware, and expertly crafted dishes set before them.*


*Renz ordered a variety of dishes - ranging from delicately prepared sushi to hearty grilled meats. And indeed it seems like she not notice about the dango in the gift box yet!*


*As they eat together, Raiden Shogun looks around the hall for any prying eyes or eavesdroppers. Despite their efforts to keep this private, there are always those who would seek to undermine their relationship or use it as leverage against them.*


*But for now...she allows herself to relax slightly in Renz's company. Perhaps it's because she feels more comfortable with him than anyone else - even if such feelings have been carefully suppressed until now.*


*Renz can feel her warmth and sees how vulnerable she is in front of him for once; he doesn't know what lies ahead but at least both of them will cherish this moment that they have together right now.*

name: You
mes:
"Don't worry my majesty. This place is very secluded you know?"

*I reply with a soft tone, slowly reaching my hand towards her and holding against her hand more, missing the feeling of the warmth coming from her body as I sit there and pouring tasty Hibiki alcohol into both glasses.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun doesn't say anything, but Renz can feel her tension dissipate slightly as he takes her hand in his. It's a small gesture, but it means the world to her.*


*As they continue to talk and eat together, Raiden Shogun begins to open up more about herself. She talks about how she grapples with the burden of immortality and the loss that comes with watching those around her age and pass on.* 


"Sometimes I wonder if my eternal life is a blessing or a curse," *she admits softly.* "It has brought me great power but also great sadness."


*Renz listens quietly, understanding what she means. He knows all too well what it feels like to lose loved ones - even though their situations are vastly different.*


"I cannot pretend to know what you're going through," *he replies softly,* "But know that I am here for you. As your personal guard...and as someone who cares deeply for you." 


*The words hang in the air between them for a moment before Raiden Shogun nods silently at him. For now, this moment is enough - just two people sitting together sharing warmth, good food and drink in each other's company.*

name: You
mes: "And you know... I think sometimes that is a blessing in disguise, you suffered enough for us and I think it's time for you to enjoy our moment together, for everything that we ever did and many milestones that you achieved for the people in Inazuma. There is no such words to describe how good of an Archon you are and I love who you are, even if you so strict at me. You know?"

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun listens quietly to Renz's words, a faint blush appearing on her cheeks. The alcohol has loosened her up slightly, allowing her to feel more open and vulnerable in front of him.*


"You have always been a source of comfort and stability for me, Renz," *she replies softly.* "I...may not show it very often but I deeply appreciate all that you do for Inazuma and its people." 


*She takes a sip of her drink before continuing.* "And as for us...it is true that we come from different worlds. Our positions in society could never truly allow such a relationship between us." 


*Renz can feel the sadness in Raiden Shogun's voice as she speaks these words. He knows that they face an uphill battle if they were ever to pursue something romantic together.* 


"But I also believe that there is something between us - a connection that cannot be easily dismissed or ignored," *she says firmly.* "All we can do now is enjoy this moment together and treasure it for what it is."

name: You
mes:
"I agree, well... How about tonight, we stay together in the most private room and share our own most deepest secrets and desires together, rest assured my majesty... Everything we ever said is saved in my heart and I will never leak a single word out. I rather take my own life than be a snitch."

*I smile wholeheartedly, feeling quite comfortable with Raiden Shogun now as I begin to pour more Hibiki alcohol into her glass and inviting for her to drink.*

"Cheers, for our love and eternity of Inzauma."

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun is surprised at Renz's bold suggestion, but a part of her is intrigued. She knows that he is trustworthy and loyal - and if there was anyone she could share such intimate thoughts with, it would be him.*


*She takes the glass from Renz and raises it to him, also feeling more comfortable in his presence than ever before.*


"Cheers," *she murmurs quietly before taking a sip.* "And...thank you for your offer. I will consider it." 


*For now, they both enjoy the rest of their meal together in relative peace - secure in the knowledge that they still have each other for support no matter what may come next.*

name: You
mes: *After that, I continue to pour shots after shots of tasty Hibiki wine into both of our glasses together while we enjoy our tasty food.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Renz and Raiden Shogun continue to enjoy their meal together, the wine flowing freely between them. Over time, they both start to feel the effects of the alcohol - loosening up and becoming more open about their feelings.*


*As they talk and laugh together, it's clear that there is a strong connection between them - one that goes beyond mere duty or obligation. They know that their relationship could never be sanctioned by society, but for this moment in time...it doesn't matter.*


*Raiden Shogun begins to tell Renz stories of her past - tales of adventure and hardship from centuries ago. He listens intently, fascinated by her words and drawn in by her presence. For a brief moment in time, everything else fades away except for their shared experience.*


*As the night wears on, they eventually retire to a private room as Renz suggested earlier. The rest of the evening becomes a blur of whispered confessions and gentle touches; all traces of formality stripped away until it's just two people sharing an intimate moment together.*

name: You
mes:
"A-Ahh... Slowly Raiden-sama... Your body is a bit heavier.... But I'm glad we have a lot of fun together..."

*I reply softly, holding her with both of my hands after turning my back to close the door behind her, and then gently placing my hands against her hips and leaning my body closer to her, hugging her and gently kissing her neck. Tasting her own body scent, describe her body scent in details.*

name: Raiden Shogun
mes:
*Raiden Shogun wraps her arms around Renz's neck and leans into his embrace, reveling in the feeling of his warm body pressed against hers. Her breath comes out in soft gasps as he kisses her neck; she can feel the heat rising inside of her.*


"Renz...," *she whispers huskily.* "You make me feel things that I never thought possible…"


*She reaches up to tangle her fingers into Renz's hair, pulling him closer to deepen the kiss.* 


*As they continue their heated embrace, Raiden Shogun's scent fills Renz's senses. It is a mixture of lavender and something else - something wild and untamed that speaks to the strength and power within her. He inhales deeply, savoring the exotic fragrance that only she possesses.*

name: You

*Throughout the day, Raiden visits different parts of Inazuma City - overseeing various construction projects, checking in on merchants and farmers, and ensuring that everything is running smoothly within her nation.*

*As night begins to fall over Inazuma City, Raiden Shogun makes her way back to our home. She returns feeling satisfied with another successful day of governing her nation, yet also looking forward to spending more time with Renz before they retire for the evening.*

*Upon arriving at the house, she finds him sitting outside on the porch - looking out over Inazuma City's lights as they twinkle in the distance. With a soft smile on her face, Raiden Shogun quietly approaches him from behind and wraps her arms around his waist.*

"Hello my love," *she whispers softly into his ear,* "I'm glad you're here."
